subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Almost every time there was an important moment, Odor seemed to have a hand or a foot in it, inspiring his teammates to a 2-0 lead in the best-of-five series going into Game 3 Sunday night.
snippet: Almost every time there was an important moment, Odor seemed to have a hand or a foot in it, inspiring his teammates to a 2-0 lead in the best-of-five series going into Game 3 Sunday night.
